abstract: My sister, 82, and I, 65, are visiting Edinburgh in late October to visit her granddaughter who is studying at the university. We have visited before and have seen the major sights. Can you give suggestions for off-the-beaten-track treasures and treks? We both love history and share the maiden name of Duncan - so anything that links us to the "homeland" is a lure. We recognize the weather will probably be challenging, but we are intrepid!Sandy Holmes, Shaker Heights, Ohio

headline.main: Q&A: An Autumn Trip to Edinburgh
